name: Tranche in a synthetic securitisation without securitisation special purpose entity (SSPE)
description: A Tranche in a synthetic securitisation without securitisation special purpose entity (SSPE) is either a Financial guarantee or a Deposit acting as a collateral for a particular part of the underlying Pool of assets.

cube_structure_item.description: A discriminator to distinguish between different tranches in a synthetic securitisation, specifically between financial guarantees and deposits.
